short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A website blocker to prevent distractions. You can allow yourself access to a distracting site for a minute.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A website blocker to prevent distractions. You can allow yourself access to a distracting site for a minute, then the extension will ask you to close the tab. Extension compatible with "ShinyTimer", a gadget that connects via bluetooth to Chrome and sends requests to this extension.
